speaker: President.
english: President. Mr Winkler, forgive me, but there is usually no limit to the time that the Council and the Commission can speak, but this morning we have timetable problems due to the time we took up during the last debate. I would ask you, if you can, to limit your speaking time as well so that the Members can speak. I would be grateful.
original: President. Mr Winkler, forgive me, but there is usually no limit to the time that the Council and the Commission can speak, but this morning we have timetable problems due to the time we took up during the last debate. I would ask you, if you can, to limit your speaking time as well so that the Members can speak. I would be grateful.
agenda_item: Preparations for the European Council: the Lisbon Strategy (debate)
